channel.title: [GLITCH] Residue Processing pipe in the "water tower" glitches at certain angles
channel.description:
This pipe in the "water tower" structure in Residue Processing glitches to appear as though it's above the water when looked at from a certain angle. (See the getpos information.) I'm running BM at full settings.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_Bugs/bm_c2a4a0003.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_Bugs/bm_c2a4a0004.jpg[/img]
map: bm_c2a4a
getpos: setpos 21.561216 213.318359 420.031250;setang 83.462471 54.570419 0.000000
